properties.description: We are a church cafe to which everyone is welcome. Drinks are on a free/pay what you can basis, and we also offer affordable cakes and soup.
properties.title: Central Church cafe Edinburgh

properties.address: The Salvation Army, 1 East Adam Street, Edinburgh EH8 9TF
properties.description: Open from 03-11-2022. Our 'Toasty' cafe is open from 10am-2.30pm serving simple hot food and drinks. Debt Advice Service and Digital Skills Training Service also running at the same time.
properties.title: Edinburgh City Salvation Army
